List Of All Monsters With Descriptions
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): FAQ: The Most Important Game Info: List Of All Monsters With Descriptions
By Lisa Shock on Saturday, October 19, 2002 - 07:47 pm:

In Monster Rancher 3, the monsters are not assigned numbers (as in the other MR games).
This list is simply in order of: Main breed alphabetical, subs in Encyclopedia order.


Main BreedNameLocaleDescription
BakuBakuBrilliaA big furry lovable monster with a huge appetite. Contrary to its looks, it actually is very agile.
ElectrieelGoatThis monster mutated from a huge catfish. They say lightning hitting the fish is what triggered the transformation.
KobuTakramaThey say at the top of its head you can find the legendary "water of happiness," but no one has been blessed by it yet.
LeonKalaragiSleeping Lion" is the perfect phrase to describe Leon, because it is asleep just about all the time. Maybe a little too much.
BaksheeshMorxThe tusks on the lower jaw can throw anyone. Only rarely does this Baku turn violent, but once it starts to turn, no one can stop it.
Beeslim?Although it often works out, it is not seeing much result. It is still looking for the dumbbells it lost last week.
BeaklonAvalancheBrilliaThe horn is as cold as an icicle and radiates cold air. When two horns of these monsters touch, they freeze together!
ScissorsGoatThe scissor-shaped horns on its head cut anything. If it abuses the horns, they fall off, but that is ok because they'll grow back quickly.
ScorpiTakramaThis savage monster has poison at the tip of its horn. However, about 10 of them die each year due to their own poison, which is kind of silly...
MoseKalaragiBecause of its huge shoulders and horn that can act as a straw to suck honey directly from a beehive, it has come to love sweet things.
BeaklonMorxProtected by strong armor equipped with powerful muscles, this monster also has the power of flight. Some say their intelligence is rather low, but that isn't really true.
Bealock?It is a strong warrior, but it has one weka point: it cannot swim because its body is made of stone.
Bercouger?Forever rival of the Beaklon, its scissors are just as powerful as Beaklon's horns.
Cantalos?Cantalos emits a sweet odor from its body to confuse its enemies. Don't go too close, because the smell will stay with you for days.
Tanklon?Enthusiastic fans called the "Tanklon Battalion" are crazy about this monster. I think it's that cool shade of green.
ColorPandoraKoronitBrilliaWhen the weather becomes cold, its fur becomes thicker. You can tell which region the monster is from by looking at the thickness of the fur.
FukazukinGoatIts shape came to resemble a shark after it adapted to the marine environment. It also need not worry about getting eaten by a shark this way...
KorodangoTakramaIf you poke this monster, it curls up to protect itself. Although it could probably move faster in that shape, it never does. Maybe it hurts to roll?
ColorpandoraKalaragiCool, Merry, and enthusiastic, each of the three has a different characteristic. Humans could learn from the way these three support each other.
MarimbaMorxEasily mistaken for a tree, people often try to cut them down. But every time, the three bind tightly together and they are saved.
Kupukkoro?People say that watching Capukkoro will cure colds and other common ailments. Kapukoros do not appreciate this kind of superstition.
DragonShimurngBrilliaThis dragon is said to be the guardian god of this region. It is strong against the cold with its thick fur and its breath is a special flame called "Ice Breath".
ZaratanGoatThis creature can swim in the water as if it were flying, and its blue skin is rough like a shark's. Don't touch it - you'll hurt your fingers.
DrugerTakramaThis divine dragon used to be called Pi-Long. It has been fighting so long it has forgotten anything else exists in the world.
FafneelKalaragiThis smart dragon first immobilizes the opponent with the poisonous thorns on its jaw. However, sometimes it accidently pricks itself...
DragonMorxIn the future, this monster will be a legend. Although its power is virtually limitless, this power is said to be hard to release.
Grupus?Grupus was born when moss grew on a Dragon hibernating underground. It can photo-synthesize, so it can live for many days without eating.
Kujata?This mysterious dragon is said to have come from the other side of the moon, though that is not really true. It has a bad temper and is hard to train.
Tigon?Imitataing bamboo a dragon like an illusion you can't really see. I can't tell if it's only sleeping - there is still no one who knows for sure.
Kung Fu?"I have never seen Kung Fu get hit by an enemy," says a Breeder that trained one. [and she's not lying!]
DakkungDakkungBrillaA romatic, despite its voice and moves, it fancies itself beautiful. Its "Self Bomb" is a must-see. Beyond this, we dont't know much about it.
WakkungGoatWakkung knows the ring is fashionable. Although they say it changes patterns itself, no one has seen it in person.
KarakarakkungTakramaFor some reason, Karakkung is afraid of triangles. When it sees one, it starts meditating. I wonder why?
TokunbokunKalaragiIt used to have beautiful skin until it got a tan. Now it is so sad it just looks at itself in the water and cries.
DokkungMorxIt polishes its acorn body until it is shiny. The woodland creatures then use it as a mirror.
Windukkung?This creature has no sense of direction, which has led to the proverb, "Don't ask Windukkung for directions." It often gets lost.
Eggkkung?A rumor suggests there is a raw Eggukkung and a cooked Eggukkung though it's preobebly just a bad joke made by breeders who missed breakfast.
Planekung?This mystery monster is said to have been bathed in starlight for 1,000 years. Its secrets have yet to berevealed.
Cookun?His goal is to become the world's best chef, so every day he is busy studying. But, the truth is that his own body is the most delicious thing.
DurahanHighlanderBrilliaAn armor monster adapted to the snow. The say it used to be the soul of a warrior who died on a quest for a legendary place.
DrydonGoatThe reincarnation of a man born, raised, and killed at sea. The axe of blue metal is said to be strong enough to slice into other dimensions.
GaloodaTakramaA quick and agile warrior with a soul as hot as the desert sun. It used to fly freely in the air.
Ruin SectorKalaragiThe armor of Ruin Sector, also known as "Neck Slicer," was possesed by the soul of a monster. We still don't know what happened to Ruin.
DurahanMorxThis monster took over armor that is said to have belonged to a Tochikab warrior. A rumor says the sword is alive, but no one knows for sure.
Cabaree?Cabaree came from a different world called Horn Hoce. Its superior lancing technique is touted as an art form.
Masala?It used to be a warrior of light, but after it found a demon sword, its mind was lost, and its body color became dark.
Forestra?The ancient White Knight. Its sword has te magic power of repelling evil. Many have witnessed it sitting quietly in the woods.
Enki?There once was a country that was at war with Tochika. Enki is said to be the armor used in that country, feared because it is cursed.
GitanGitanBrilliaGently floating along with its big ears and big tail, this monster looks very mysterious. I wonder why it's eyes are always swollen...
OltanGoatI've no idea what it's thinking, but it does have cute eyes. Careful, if you let your guard down near it, you're liable to get poked.
CactonTakaramaThis cactus always stands silently, but sometimes it just has to jump. It's affectionate towards people, but nothing can save the person it approaches...
ColtanKalaragiDespite the glowing body, sharp eyes, and stern looks, it's really just lonely, and wants some friends to play with.
OotanMorxThis monster was raised in the forest by a wolf. It howls at the full moon with its big mouth. Isn't that a little annoying?
Maestan?Because it's busy listening to all the music in the world, it is always sleep-deprived. It may look unpleasant, but it's really a kind musician at heart.
GolemElebusBrilliaThis shiny and highly visible Golem is made entirely of ice. It is very popular during hot summer days.
KaioGoatIt is said this Golem is modeled after a sea god in a fairy tale. This si the only Golem not afraid of water.
LapislatelTakramaCalled "Desert Castle" this Golem has high defense. When travelling in the desert, Breeders sometimes bring one instead of a tent.
LemlariaKalaragiThis golden Golem has been blessed by the mysterious powers of the deep forest. It looks golden because of the magical blessing.
GolemMorxThis Golem is a kind monster who loves to be one with nature. However, in battle it will fight furiously with powerful techniques.
Ormeka?This ancient and mysterious Golem was just recently discovered. Its body was covered with moss, so it must have been there awhile.
Nedel?This ecological Golem likes places with lots of wind from which it can generate energy. Kids love it because it looks like a toy.
Baum?This Golem is made froma 1000-year-old oak tree. Birds build nests among the leaves.
Oh?Even among Golems, which pride themseles on their strength, this flamboyant egotist is notably strong. Is it for real?
HareStrawberryBrilliaStrawberry is a friendly and spoiled baby. Popular as a pet, its favorite food is the strawberry, as you might have guessed.
SpearmintGoatThe twisty thing on its head is not hair, but a shell. It is so fashionable that it goes underwater to put on these stylish things.
JiroTakramaThis monster can curl up into a highly armored ball. But if the wind blows when its like this, it will be rolling around all over the place.
ScurfyKalaragiIt always has a cynical smile, but really it's very kind. It is very good-looking, too, brushing its eyebrows every morning until they are perfect.
HareMorxFamous for its long ears and cute moves, Hare is always energetic. Watch for its powerful Spin Fist!
Panthy?Wearing today's most stylin' outfit, Panthy is known among young Breeders for its charisma.
Honey?Honey is famous for its cute hips and round ears. No matter how hard it flaps its wings, it can only fly a a couple inches at most.
Mumm?Mumm always wakes up early to put on its dress and apron. It is a hard worker, always preparing meals.
HengarMetanixBrilliaA cold weather type Henger epquiped with skis. It must have patrolled the mountainous regions frequently.
SkullwaveGoatThsi monster is said to bear the soul of the legendary pirate Edgar. However, no one knows anything about this Edgar, so...
HengarTakaramaA mysterious robot monster made by an ancient lost civilization. Its mechanism could not be understood for a very long time.
Dark BringerKalaragiIts hand is a knife, and it can see in the dark. Thus, people say that this monster must have been an assasination device in ancient times.
KyuzaMorxThis is the most common type of Henger that was manufactured. Different color versions and custom types can also be seen.
Avaoner?It can fly swiftly in the air using its large wings. On the ground however, its wings get stuck in alleys and doorways. Very inconvenient.
Vulcan?They say this was the champion machine in the Henger fights long ago that made the Ancients go crazy.
Burstliner?The heaviest of all the Hengers. It is good at making roads and tunnels, and its earthshaking attacks are very powerful.
Locomotive?It imitated a 'locomotive' which it saw in a foriegn country. Its performance is the same as a normal Hengar.
JellMarshmallowBrilliaThey are great hunters. The white Jell blends in perfectly with the snow as they sneak silently up and fire their Jell Cannons.
JellGoatThese Jell creatures have avoided contact with humans, and thus have not taken on a human shape. This is the true shape of a Jell.
CarameTakramaIts body is covered with sand, but the inside is full of Jell Water. They sometimes help desert wanderers with this water.
KakaoKalaragiThanks to the heat of the jungle, KaKao is very easy-going. On a moonlit night, you might be a ble to see its Jell Dance, though you'll lose guts points.
KuloroMorxThe green Jell body is full of chlorophyll. They say it can live for a long time on just water and light.
Puddingel?A very tasty-looking monster. It's true what they say, that the Tochikans invented pudding after first seeing Puddingel.
JokerJokerMorxWhen you see it, run away as fast as you can. It is a messenger of Death, or maybe it is Death itself. Its name is Death Joker. Protect yourself.
Maggi?No one knows where it is from. If it proposes a bet using cards, don't accept. If you lose the bet, you'll lose your life. Watch out!
LesioneBiansnowBrilliaBe careful not to mess with its hairstyle, because it gets very upset. Make sure you redo its hair after every battle.
LesioneGoatThis a spoiled baby whose cry for its mother caused it to become a Lesihorne. Other Lesiones start crying when they hear it cry.
SandlessieTakramaThis monster was thought of as royal and noble since it used to carry the King on its back. You can see this in the insignia on its forehead.
HibisKalaragiThe flower on it tail grows bigger as Hibis gets older. Perfumes created from this flower are a special product made solely in Kalaragi.
GriliefMorxThe leaf is for camouflage reasons. Its hiding ability is so great that even thier Breeders can't find them.
Coral?It's texture is soft like a sponge. It feels so good that you want to sleep on its back.
Diamante?The horns that grow out every year become valuable gemstones. Many wedding rings are made from them. Girls often long for one.
Seapea?Very gentle and kind, it's an ideal playmate for children. When it is in a good mood, it will show you tricks.
Metal Head?It usually saves energy for upcoming fights by doing nothing. A very clever monster...
MewKontaBrilliaKonta thinks it can do anything with just a peice of a leaf. It often tries to use the leaf as money and gets in trouble for it.
TortboyGoatThis is the most relaxed of all Mews, and because of this many people want it as a pet. It can move surprisingly fast sometimes though.
MewkiriTakramaMewkiri thinks it is a giraffe, so it doesn't like being called a monster. Nonetheless, it continues to eat fish rather than grass.
MewKalaragiThis monster likes to sing so much that at some point it started carrying a microphone around. Lately it's been wanting to try acting, too.
BambiimewMorxThis Mew has adapted to a forest setting. The pattern on its back resembles light streaming through the leaves of a tree, making great camoflauge.
Boochin?Its big nose can vacuum up anything. Its power is so great, it once sucked up all the mushrooms in the Morx Forest.
Kero?Kero adapted to a water environment differently than Tortboy. It is said it sometimes sings a song to bring the rain
Mewsneak?A theif who disturbs the city every night, stealing instead of working. If she doesn't watch her figure, she soon won't be able to fit into that fur coat.
Mew-J?A Mew that loves basketball but has no real skills. When it decides to dunk, it always end up going through the hoop rather than the ball.
Mewseijin?Its body is covered with a special skin, and its large eyes are always shining. There are rumors that it's from another planet, or that it is really a machine.
MocchiSherbetBrilliaRaised as a seal, this monster stayed with them until one day it realised the truth. The tears shed then are still visible.
IsobeGoatIsobe was the most famous creature in Goat, untill they found Octopee. Go Isobe! Show them you're still the best!
WarabiTakramaIts skin is actually covered in sand. Because it carefully keeps itself covered, no one knows the real color of its skin.
KoloroKalagariKoloro has lived in kalaragi for a long, long time. Every year at the famous Koloro Festival you can see the Koloro dance. It's fun!
MocchiMorxIt's cute moves and sticky skin make it popular among breeders. The cute squeaky voice is another reason to love it.
Succhi?"Welcome!" Succhi says this all the time, but it desn't make much sense. It had two friends, but after a fight, they left. It likes to wake up early.
Sumocchi?He has mastered the eastern art of wrestling called "Sumo". He retired the rank of Yokozuna [champion] and has entered the arena of Monster Battles!
Cosmocchi?It was predicted this Mocchi will one day save the world. But it doesn't know that yet, and lives every day peacefully, calm and relaxed.
MogiFleeceBrilliaThis monster is good at winter sports and is often called "Prince os the Snow Feild." However, the best thing about it is its ability to make a snowhouse.
OffshoreGoatThsi one likes to sit underwater, moving along with the current. Unfortunately, sometimes fish lay their eggs in its hair.
MogiTakramaIt uses the big dril on its head to dif through teh ground ona 16-beat rythm. It's kind of like a mole.
TigreKalaragiThsi monster is wild, as its looks suggest. Many Breeders fear this monster. But you seldom meet these, so don't worry.
BoscoMorxThis monster likes reed whistles, and walks around whistling all the time. Since it tries to use all kinds of grasses, sometimes its lips get swollen.
Maharajan?This monster does mystic moves called "Yogar." They say that even if it is hurt, using "Yogar" it can heal quickly. Can this be true?
Blacki?Living in the streeets, it is never without its sunglasses. Shrewder than the other Mogis, it often ditches training.
Mo-MoPepeBrilliaPepe is popular with children because of its cute walk, but Pepe actually does not like kids much because they always mess ups its neat hair.
LuluGoatSometimes you will find a wild LuLu while fishing. Fisherpeople love to see Lulu's cute emerging from the water.
ZazaTakramaWhile you can often see Zaza having fun, rolling down the sand dunes, no one has ever seen Zaza climbing back up the dunes...
KikiKalaragiMischievious Kiki likes to jump from tree to tree and drop nuts on people walking below. Watch out!
MomoMorxMomo likes to be calm and move at its own pace. It always carries that large large walnut for its aroma-theraputic effects.
Panko?Panko is an unconventional dresser and loves to travel. It might be coming to your town soon!
NagaRyozanBrilliaSometimes, this monster starts hibernating before the winter comes, which is why many Breeders have given up on this monster.
MermanGoatWith the gills on its breast, it can breathe underwater. The monster sees itself as a mermaid, but otehrs have trouble with that idea.
AspisTakramaAs the deadly colors on its skin show, it has poisonous fangs, claws, and tail. They say it cannot help dancing when it hears a flute melody.
NagaKalaragiAlthough they say this is the most ferocious monster of all, it is actually quite careless. It often fails to catch its prey.
ViperMorxIt claims to be vegetarian but, as is the case with humans, that doesn't mean it's true.
Ekidonna?A black Naga that came from the darkness. Its powers are unknown. A very mysterious monster.
Eega?This eerie eel-shaped monster often squeals with laughter, though it too can't seem to figure out what it is that's so funny.
Crawl?Thsi monster is absolutely confident in its swimming ability. With its high-tech swimming suit on, it trains every day to become #1 in the world.
OctopeeYuppeeBrilliaYuppees are usually energetic, jumping, running, and rolling. But when they're tired and just standing still, they look just like snowmen.
OctopeeGoatOctopee is usually very docile, but once it gets upset, it won't stop. When you see its eyes change, RUN!
OctomeeTakramaAn ancient race attempted to give eternal life to this monster. Judging by all those bandages, the experiment must have failed.
PiyopiKalaragiThis Octopee was born from a hard-shelled egg. It continues to switch shells as it grows, much like a hermit crab.
HohoctoMorxThis Octopee lives in trees. However, they are very bad at climbing, so once they fall out of a tree, they can't get back up again.
Dalphi?This is a rare black and white Octopee! I've heard there are only 102 in the whole world!
Actopee?While monsters have been doing theater for a long time, Actopee's performances seem especially popular among women.
OgyoBreezaBrilliaSaid to be shown in conjunction with the Arurora. It is also known as the "Snowfield Queen."
OgyoGoatThis magnificent maiden is the most elegant of them all. Because of its great pride, you must be careful how you treat it.
MunleeTakramaThis sweet monster performs under the solitude of the desert moon. Dancers often use it in their designs.
GalberraKalaragiA happy monster born where varicolored flowers bloom. The scent must have resulted in some form of monster therapy.
OdyuMorxThis character likes to stand in the green grass and breathe deeply. It might not do well in a place too cold or too hot.
Lovina?This blissed-out monster loves bright colors. It is said anyone who sees it will become happy, but the happiest of all has to be the monster itself.
PanchoShironchoBrilliaDon't speak too loud when you hear Shironcho. It will go inside its shell and never come out.
ShellunchoGoatIt lives in the sea where the currents are calm. It is said that this monster was born from the tears of a mermaid. How poetic!
TsubonchoTakramaSince they say that Tsuboncho will grant three wishes to the Breeder that has been nice to it, many Breeders tend to spoil their Tsubonchos rotten.
PanchoKalaragiA huge pumkin-turned-monster. Like a hermit crab, the shell doesn't grow, so a new one has to be found periodically. That's why it makes such a mess.
KurinchoMorxThis monster was found under a huge chestnut tree. Initially the monster still had burrs, and many breeders were hurt.
Makyu?Makyu mesmerises its fans with its exciting battles. It is always trying to improve itself, looking for a bigger battlefield.
Afro?There is a planetarium inside. Since the shell kind of looks like a human face, this monster was once thought to bring bad luck.
PixieAngelBrilliaSome say it is a messenger from God, which is not true. Some also say it's good luck if an Angel's eyes are open, but this only happens when they are angry...
WindineGoatA Fairy of water, this where Windine came from. There are rumors it is going out with Jell. Kind of a careless monster.
PixieTakaramaIt is very spoiled and mischievious, pretty but not always nice. The Male Breeders should be especially careful. Yes, you too.
Night FlyerKalaragiThis fairy is meant to be messenger of the night, but now it works in the day. Maybe it is afraid of the dark? Yet it still becomes dizzy with bright light.
FarnMorxA peaceful and happy fairy that does not get along with Pixie. It seems something happened between them. I wonder what?
Nymph?A very easy-going fairy that lives in the forest and does not worry about a thing. It loves to sunbathe and sleep in the shade behind a tree.
Pansy?A fairy with a sad past in which it lost everything. It stopped smiling, and its eyes became red from crying so long.
Valkyrie?This fairy was born to fight. It's friendly unless you make it upset. The blue eye can see the future while the red eye can see the past.
Fantuger?A strange fairy that came from teh land of Chuka. Some maniacs really love this monster. It is looking for a particular scroll...
Fay?I wonder what misery these dark eyes have seen? It's said Fay has been through such sadness that the tears have dyed the area around its eyes black...
PlantKesshokaBrilliaWhen the wind blows, its beautiful song can be heard. The melody makes you sleepy and sometimes you get lost.
CoconutGoatIt moves by drifting in the ocean, so it was thought to be a tiny island. They even called this monster "Floating Isle".
SaboranTakramaA famous story describes how a Plant fell in love with a desert Chickchick and had a Lord change it into a Cactaran. If it sees a Chickchick the flowers turn red.
Jungle PlumKalaragiIts dance is so amazing that toys were made to mimic it. It used to have one growing up.
PlantMorxIt was once rumored that if a Plant grew up in Sparta, its flowers would become blue. Although not true, many Plants ran away and became stray monsters.
Akihabana?A mysterious monster who is said to have come from the legendary Electri-city. They say its face sometimes shows this faraway citiscape.
PsirollerRabbirollerBrilliaOne day a snow rabbit found a roller, sat on it, and found it could not let go. This is how Rabbiroller was born.
VivarollerGoatThe sahrp fangs are not used to fight, but to clean its rollers. This monster likes to keep things clean and tidy. It lives underwater.
ArmadirollerTakramaThe thorny points come from the skin of Armadiroller. It is always curled up motionless behind the rocks, because it is just too hot.
PsirollerKalaragiThis monster was recently discovered and many things are stil unknown. Is it just a rhino, or is the roller alive too? It's still often debated.
BearrollerMorxOne day, a Tochikcan girl was taking a walk in the woods when she found this monster. Since the monster kept following her, she decided to keep it.
Baliroller?Its name is Bariroller. No one can run faster. Its eyes are full of the sadness and happiness of running.
Tornado?This is Tornado. He is the expert of great tackles! No one can approach his dumbbell trained body.
RaidenRaipenpennBrilliaIt has a rather indistinct face, but this monster can't be tricked. Called "The Strongest in the Snowfield," it puts its all into battles.
PeligoonGoatThis cool Pelican is proud of how its beak can hold anything. Will it come to hold your heart too?
GriphyonTakramaThis bird is revered as the King of the Sands, but it is really rather modest. It must be quietly training in the desert somewhere right now...
PhowouKalaragiThis monster will one day be legendary. It has a strong sense of fairness, and in that red body, a heart burns with the flame of justice.
RaidenMorxThis monster never misses daily training. It does not bother with small things, thinking only about ways to become stronger.
Petraden?If you want to know this monster's history, just ask. It isn't called a living fossil just for show it really has lived through an eternity.
Cowbird?A cowbird here from the edge of the wilds. It puts on its prideful hat, and with its quick-draw Western punch aims for the loot.
SuezoUsazoBrilliaA timid prankster, Suezo likes to hide in the snow and scare people. Once, it even scared itself.
FukazoGoatFukazo is often mistaken for a shark, and this makes it angry. And when it' angry, it's far scarier than a measley shark!
SuezoTakramaCharming and mischievious, this eyeball monster is popular but difficult to handle, hence all the stray Suezos around lately.
MonzoKalaragiMonzo loves listening to gossip, but what it doesn't realize is that its big ears are often the subject of gossip themselves!
TanuzoMorxIt loves nuts and berries, and can run away quickly. Unlike other Suezos, this one is well behaved.
Suecho?Due to its upbringing, it is kind of spoiled. If it doesn't get its way, it throws a fit. It's butler always looks dumbfounded.
SuzurinBlizzarinBrilliaBlizzarin comes in December and gives presents to children, but if you've been bad, you may not gte any.
MaririnGoatI heard Maririn used to work for a sea god named Ogyo. They say that Ogyo was a tyrant, and Maririn was always suffering.
SenorinTakramaIf you are ever lost in the desert, try calling for Senorin! Though it can't help you, it will make you forget about everything with its funky moves.
KuririnKalaragiWhen you see Kuririn in the woods, put out your fires. If Kuririn catches fire it will explode.
SuzurinMorxDr. Shiroki found this fairy monster. The dovtor found this monster so sweet he just had to scream "Wowee!"
Drarin?A monster from the land of Night. Though it looks dangerous, it actually will faint if it sees blood. It is very popular in the land of Night.
Holstarin?People were curious about where this monster gets the milk it brings, so they finally decided to follow it, only to see something they shouldn't have.
Kerorin?On rainy days Kerorin plays outside then comes inside soaking wet. Some say Kerorin causes the rain to pour.
Rayrin?A fairy from the land of Chucka. Despite the pale face, it's very healthy. It loves to take naps, but don't spoil it too much.
TigerTigerBrilliaThanks to Tochikans, the once feared "Blue Gale" Tiger can now be trained by anyone. Once you become friends, it will never betray you.
GalumGoatGalum's fur repels water, so it never really gets wet. That's why it can move so swiftly underwater.
AnubisTakramaAnubis lives alone in the desert, and it is very difficult to tame. It takes an experienced breeder to train it. You might be a good match.
RyulonKalaragiThe two beautiful horns tell us this is the King of Tigers. Unlike the others, they live in packs and take care of their families.
RemusMorxThis monster was recently discovered in the jungle. Its fur acts as camoflauge, which is why not one could find it before.
Ruby?The red body signifies the blood of Nagazi, the strongest monster of all. Maybe there is a breeder who can revoive this monster.
Fenril?It is said this monster once fought with the legendary Dragon, but we don't know for sure. The scar on its forehead is rumored to be from that battle.
Dobor IT?This Tiger once saved a girl from a burning house. Its fur burned away and gave it this new look.
ZanZanBrilliaThe only thing this monster knows is how to fight. The Tochikans saw this as a danger and sealed the monster away, but a scientist recently revived it.
RetsuGoatImpressed by the lifestyle of a crawfish, it tries every day to live like one. This why it is so good at fighting underwater.
BuiTakramaAs a result of living under the strong desert sun, uncessary body water has evaporated. This is how this monster became lighter and faster than a normal Zan.
ShinKalaragiThe side of its arms is shaped like a huge blade. It probably uses this to push the tall jungle grass aside as it walks.
GaiMorxThis monster has the fastest airspeed. They say it learned to fight in midair froma falcon living in the woods.
Izuna?Only a few people have seen Izuna before. It is said this is because Izuna has mastered the martial art of Ninjutsu.
ZoomPashminerBrilliaPashminer is so proud of its gorgeous muffler. It fancies itself to be quite stylish, but no one else really thinks so.
PalasauloGoatWhat looks like a long horn is actually a long nose, which allows it to breathe underwater. It is the champion of the swimming contest each year.
HotrodTakramaThis monster runs in the desert at night. It doesn't really mind that it can only run in straight lines. Its shiny mane is the symbol of a Zoom.
GranperKalaragiIt was born with that great looking beard, which can be combined with the horn on its head to see things far, far away.
ZoomMorxThis monster is so gentle and tame that is is often recommended for new breeders. It is also very playful, guaranteed to make you smile.
Fotorunner?Its great strides are moving to behold. Some say the name originally came from the fact that it often finds itself running subconsciously.
Tatton J?A billionaire spent lots of money to create this battle monster. Its flame tattoo symbolizes its furious fighting style.


I have tried to retain the actual spelling and punctuation as seen in the game.
